Sentencas: In this work a novel coal fueled power plant, which combines coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell technology, is presented.
Titulo: High efficiency coal-fired power plant of the future

Sentencas: The cycle is a modification of an earlier one proposed by the same authors [Lobachyov and Richter, Journal of Energy Resources Technology, 1996, 188].
Titulo: High efficiency coal-fired power plant of the future

Sentencas: It retains most of the elements of the previous plant: Conoco CO2 acceptor gasification process, solid oxide fuel cell and state-of-the-art gas turbines.
Titulo: High efficiency coal-fired power plant of the future

Sentencas: A key difference between the previous and the new cycle is a different heat recovery concept.
Titulo: High efficiency coal-fired power plant of the future

Sentencas: Instead of using the sensible heat of the cathode exhaust for the coal gasification process, the fuel not oxidized in the fuel cell is burnt to provide this heat.
Titulo: High efficiency coal-fired power plant of the future

Sentencas: This new concept allows us to simplify the cycle and makes its performance less dependent on the pressure drop in different components of the cycle.
Titulo: High efficiency coal-fired power plant of the future

Sentencas: Further, it considerably reduces the exergy loss in the gas turbine by eliminating exergetically inefficient turbine blade cooling.
Titulo: High efficiency coal-fired power plant of the future

Sentencas: The new cycle achieves a gain in the overall efficiency of more than two percentage points under the same operating parameters.
Titulo: High efficiency coal-fired power plant of the future

Sentencas: At a maximum system pressure of 10 bar and an anticipated solid oxide fuel cell voltage of 0.7 V the overall thermal efficiency is approximately 63%.
Titulo: High efficiency coal-fired power plant of the future
